name: Admiring My Sister, Hina Hikawa
text: 【CONT】 If your level is 2 or higher, this card gets the following ability. "【ACT】 [Put this card into your waiting room] Choose up to 1 "Even if It Rains, Sayo Hikawa" in your hand, and put it in the stage position that this card was in." 【AUTO】 Bond/"Even if It Rains, Sayo Hikawa" [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] (When this card is played and placed on the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 "Even if It Rains, Sayo Hikawa" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)

name: And the Croquettes, Hagumi Kitazawa
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your level 0 or lower characters in front of this card get +1000 power. 【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1)] Flip over 4 cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed among those cards, perform the following action. "Choose 1 character in your waiting room, return it to your hand, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room."

name: Full of Energy, Hagumi Kitazawa
text: 【AUTO】 When a climax is placed on your opponent's climax area, you may put this card into your stock. 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if this card's battle opponent is level 0 or lower, you may put that character into your opponent's stock. If you do, put the bottom card of your opponent's stock into his or her waiting room.

name: As the Six of Us, Misaki Okusawa
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose 1 of your level 1 or higher characters, and that character gets +1 soul until end of turn. 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose 1 of your other 《Music》 characters, and that character gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of other 《Music》 characters you have ×500.

name: On My Path Towards True Bushido, Eve Wakamiya
text: 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When "Samurai Help Each Other" is placed on your climax area, choose 1 of your other characters, and that character gets the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, look at up to 4 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 《Music》 character from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room." 【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1) 【REST】 2 of your characters] Flip over X cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed among those cards, search your deck for up to 1 《Music》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck. X is equal to the total number of colors your characters in your stage have +1.

name: Deliver Smiles, Kokoro Tsurumaki
text: 【AUTO】 [Put the top card of your deck into your clock & Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 1 yellow climax, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, shuffle your deck, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn.

name: Make Everyone Smile, Kokoro Tsurumaki
text: 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your opponent's attack phase, you may move this card to an open position of your center stage.

name: A Shared Fate, Kaoru Seta
text: 【CONT】 You can put up to 4 cards with the same card name as this card and cards named ""She Who Colors the World" Kaoru Seta" in your deck. 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, look at up to 4 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 yellow character from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.

name: Normal Teenager Life, Nanami Hiromachi
text: 【CONT】 If you have 1 or less other characters, this card gets +1500 power. 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your opponent's attack phase, you may move this card to the open left position of your center stage. (You can only move it to the leftmost position)

name: A Cute Idol, Aya Maruyama
text: 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your clock] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 1 《Pastel＊Palettes》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.

name: Popular Girl Online, Toko Kirigaya
text: 【CONT】 All of your other 《Music》 characters get +500 power. 【AUTO】 Change [Put this card into your waiting room] At the beginning of your climax phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 "The Band's Charm, Toko Kirigaya" in your waiting room, and put it in the stage position that this card was in. (This ability does not activate if this card is not in the stage at the beginning of the climax phase) 【ACT】 [(1) 【REST】 2 of your characters] Put the top 2 cards of your deck into your waiting room, choose 1 level X or lower 《Music》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand. X is equal to the total level of those cards. (Climax are regarded as level 0)

name: Looking for Fun Things, Kokoro Tsurumaki
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, if you have another 《Music》 character, this card gets +3000 power. 【AUTO】 [(1)] When this card attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, during that attack, perform a trigger check 2 times on the trigger step.

name: Loaded With Fun, Hagumi Kitazawa
text: 【CONT】 If you have 2 or more other 《Hello, Happy World!》 characters, this card gets the following ability. "【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if this card's battle opponent is cost 0 or lower, you may put that character into your opponent's stock. If you do, put the bottom card of your opponent's stock into his or her waiting room." 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is level 2 or higher, you may return this card to your hand. (Climax are regarded as level 0. Return the revealed card to its original place)

name: Wacha-Mocha Panic, Kanon Matsubara
text: 【CONT】 If you have 2 or more other 《Music》 characters, this card gets +1000 power. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [(1)] At the beginning of your encore step, if "A Forced Dance" is in your climax area, this card is on your center stage, and your opponent does not have any characters on his or her center stage, or all characters on your opponent's center stage are 【REVERSE】, you may pay the cost. If you do, Trigger FEVER. 【REPLAY】 Trigger FEVER Choose up to 2 《Music》 characters in your waiting room, return them to your hand, and this card gets +1000 power until the end of your opponent's next turn.

name: The Band's Charm, Toko Kirigaya
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose 1 of your other 《Music》 characters, and that character gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of other 《Music》 characters you have ×500. 【AUTO】 Change [Put this card into your waiting room] At the beginning of your climax phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 "Popular Girl Online, Toko Kirigaya" in your waiting room, and put it in the stage position that this card was in. (This ability does not activate if this card is not in the stage at the beginning of the climax phase)

name: Whether Normal or Not, Nanami Hiromachi
text: 【CONT】 You can put up to 4 cards with the same card name as this card and cards named ""Astral Harmony" Nanami Hiromachi" in your deck. 【CONT】 If you have 2 or more other 《Music》 characters, this card gets +1000 power. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [Put 1 《Music》 character from your hand into your waiting room] When this card attacks, if "Our Music" is in your climax area, and you have another 《Music》 character, you may pay the cost. If you do, look at up to 5 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 2 《Music》 characters from among them, reveal them to your opponent, put them into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.

name: That Courage, Kanon Matsubara
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if you have 2 or more other 《Music》 characters, this card gets +2000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 When this card or this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, that character cannot use "【AUTO】 Encore" until end of turn. (The "【AUTO】 Encore [(3)]" rule cannot be used either)

name: With the Other Me, Misaki Okusawa
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, all of your other 《Hello, Happy World!》 characters get +X power. X is equal to that character's level ×500. 【ACT】 [(1) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] Choose 1 of your opponent's characters, and return it to his or her hand. 【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] This ability activates up to 1 time per turn. Choose 1 of your characters, and 【STAND】 it.

name: Sweat of Effort, Misaki Okusawa
text: 【AUTO】 When you use this card's "Backup", choose one of your characters in battle, and that character gets the following ability until of turn. "【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, put that character into your opponent's memory." 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 2000, Level 1 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose one of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +2000 power until end of turn)

name: Colorful Decorations, Eve Wakamiya
text: 【CONT】 If there is a marker underneath this card, this card gains the color blue. 【AUTO】 When your other character's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, choose 1 of your 《Pastel＊Palettes》 characters, and that character gets +2000 power until end of turn. 【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Choose 1 of your 《Pastel＊Palettes》 characters, that character gets +1000 power until end of turn, if there are no markers underneath this card, choose 1 "The Real Me, Maya Yamato" in your waiting room, and put it face up underneath this card as a marker.

name: All the World's a Stage, Kaoru Seta
text: 【AUTO】 [Put 2 cards from your hand into your waiting room] When you use this card's "Backup", you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 of your opponent's characters with level higher than your opponent's level, and put it into his or her waiting room. 【ACT】【COUNTER】 Backup 2500, Level 2 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +2500 power until end of turn)

name: A Place of Happiness, Kanon Matsubara
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +X power. X is equal to that character's level ×500. 【AUTO】 When a climax is placed on your climax area, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn. 【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Look at the top card of your deck, and put it on the top or at the bottom of your deck.

name: Tsukinomori's Charismatic Student, Toko Kirigaya
text: 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if you have 4 or more other 《Morfonica》 characters, you may pay the cost. If you do, your opponent chooses 1 climax in their waiting room, returns all cards in their waiting room except that card to their deck, and shuffles their deck.

name: Actor Who Continues Performing, Kaoru Seta
text: 【CONT】 If your waiting room has 2 or less climax, this card gets -1 level while in your hand. 【CONT】 If all of your characters are 《Hello, Happy World!》, this card gets +1500 power and the following ability. "【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to your hand." 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room.

name: A Scene of Daily Life, Aya Maruyama
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 [Put 4 《Pastel＊Palettes》 characters from your hand into your waiting room] When this card attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, this card gets +4000 power until end of turn, and deal X damage to your opponent. X is equal to the total number of colors of the cards put into your waiting room by this ability's cost. (Damage may be canceled)

name: A Fun Performance, Nanami Hiromachi
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose up to 1 character with level equal to or lower than your level in your hand, put it on any position of your stage, and that character gets +1 soul until end of turn. 【AUTO】 [(4)] When this card attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 This ability activates up to 1 time per turn. When damage dealt by this card is canceled, you may deal the same damage to your opponent." (Damage may be canceled)

name: Heartwarming Café, Tomoe Udagawa
text: 【CONT】 All of your other 《Music》 characters get +500 power. 【ACT】 [(2) 【REST】 this card] Put the top card of your clock into your waiting room.

name: An Idol's Job, Maya Yamato
text: 【CONT】 Assist If the number of colors of your characters on stage is four or more, all of your characters in front of this card get +1000 power. 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your main phase, you may choose the bottom card of your clock and a 《Pastel＊Palettes》 character in your waiting room, and exchange them.

name: Always Giving It Her All, LOCK
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, all of your other level 0 or lower characters get the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 When this card attacks, look at the top card of your deck, and put it on the top of your deck or into your waiting room." 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, look at up to X cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 card from among them, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room. X is equal to the number of other 《Music》 characters you have.

name: One Step at a Time, Ran Mitake
text: 【AUTO】 When your characters' trigger check reveals a climax, if that card's trigger icon is [[treasure.gif]], you may draw 1 card. If you do, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room. 【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1) 【REST】 this card] Flip over 4 cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed among those cards, search your deck for up to 1 《Afterglow》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.

name: Star Fairy, Moca Aoba
text: 【CONT】 If your hand has 5 or more cards, this card gets +2000 power. 【AUTO】 【CLOCK】 Alarm [Put 1 climax from your hand into your waiting room] If this card is the top card of your clock, and you have 2 or more 《Afterglow》 characters, at the beginning of your main phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 《Afterglow》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.

name: Sweet Time, Himari Uehara
text: 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your opponent's attack phase, you may move this card to an open position of your center stage. 【AUTO】 【CLOCK】 Alarm If this card is the top card of your clock, at the beginning of the climax phase, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may put the top card of your opponent's clock into your opponent's waiting room. If you do, put that character into his or her clock."

name: Hey, Hey, Hoh~! Himari Uehara
text: 【AUTO】 [Return this card to your hand] When a climax is placed on your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose one of your characters, and that character gets +2000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 【CLOCK】 Alarm If this card is the top card of your clock, and the number of 《Music》 characters you have is four or more, at the beginning of your climax phase, you may choose a character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand. If you do, choose a card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room.

name: An Unusual Maid, Tomoe Udagawa
text: 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your climax phase, if the top card of your clock is a card with "Alarm", choose one of your 《Afterglow》 characters, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn. 【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1) 【REST】 two of your characters] Flip over four cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed among those cards, search your deck for up to one 《Music》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.

name: Tsugurific, Tsugumi Hazawa
text: 【CONT】 【CLOCK】 Alarm If this card is the top card of your clock, all of your 《Afterglow》 characters get the following ability. "【AUTO】 [(1)] When this card attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, look at the top card of your opponent's deck, and put it on the top or at the bottom of his or her deck." 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 card in your clock, return it to hand, and put the top card of your deck into your clock.

name: Repaint, LAYER
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if your opponent has 1 or fewer characters on his or her center stage, choose 1 cost 0 or lower character in your opponent's center stage, and put it at the bottom of his or her deck. 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose 1 of your other 《Music》 characters, and that character gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of other 《Music》 characters you have ×500.

name: Where She Feels at Ease, MASKING
text: 【AUTO】 [Put 1 climax from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 《Music》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand. 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, all of your characters get the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 When this card's trigger check reveals a climax with [[treasure.gif]] in its trigger icon, you may draw 1 card. If you do, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room."

name: Beloved for the Strangeness, Hina Hikawa
text: 【CONT】 You can put up to 4 cards with the same card name as this card and cards named ""Path Of Tanzaku" Hina Hikawa" in your deck. 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +500 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may reveal up to 3 cards from the top of your deck. If you revealed 1 or more cards, choose up to 1 《Pastel＊Palettes》 character from among them, put it into your hand, put the rest into your waiting room, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room.

name: Sound of Heat, LAYER
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, put the top 2 cards of your deck into your waiting room, and this card gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of 《Music》 characters revealed among those cards ×1000. 【AUTO】 [(1) Put the top card of your deck into your clock] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 level 1 or lower character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.

name: The Greatest Stage, LOCK
text: 【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1)] Flip over 4 cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed among those cards, perform the following action. "Choose 1 《Music》 character in your waiting room, return it to your hand, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room."

name: Full-Power Switch, LOCK
text: 【AUTO】 [(2)] When you use this card's "Backup", you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 of your opponent's characters with level higher than your opponent's level, put it into your opponent's waiting room, your opponent chooses up to 1 level 0 or lower character in his or her waiting room, and puts it on the stage position that that character was on. 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 1000, Level 1 [Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn)

name: Aspiring to Be Cool, Tomoe Udagawa
text: 【CONT】 If you have 2 or more other 《Music》 characters, this card gets the following ability. "【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if this card's battle opponent is cost 0 or lower, you may put the top card of your opponent's clock into their waiting room. If you do, put that character into your opponent's clock." 【AUTO】 【CLOCK】 Alarm If this card is the top card of your clock, at the beginning of the climax phase, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets "【AUTO】 Encore [Put 1 character from your hand into your waiting room]" until end of turn.

name: Together Forever, Tsugumi Hazawa
text: 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room & Put 1 "Sweet Time, Himari Uehara" from your waiting room into your clock] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 《Music》 character in your clock, return it to your hand, and this card gets +2000 power until end of turn.

name: A Bright Smile, Himari Uehara
text: 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if the level of this card's battle opponent is higher than your opponent's level, you may put the top card of your opponent's clock into their waiting room. If you do, put that character into your opponent's clock. 【AUTO】 【CLOCK】 Alarm If this card is the top card of your clock, and you have 4 or more 《Music》 characters, at the beginning of your climax phase, you may put the top card of your deck into your stock.

name: A Helping Hand, Moca Aoba
text: 【AUTO】 When a climax is placed on your climax area, this card gets +1500 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if the character facing this card is level 3 or higher, this card gets +6000 power until end of turn.

name: Powerful Singing, LAYER
text: 【AUTO】 [(2)] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if you have 4 or more other 《RAISE A SUILEN》 characters, you may pay the cost. If you do, your opponent puts all of their stock into their waiting room, and puts the same number of cards from the top of their deck into their stock.

name: Incredible Performance, MASKING
text: 【CONT】 During this card's battle, all players cannot play "Backup" from their hands. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of 《Music》 characters you have ×1000.

name: Band Organizer, Tsugumi Hazawa
text: 【CONT】 All of your other 《Afterglow》 characters get +1500 power. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 【CLOCK】 Alarm [(1)] If this card is the top card of your clock, at the beginning of your main phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 "An Eternal Sunset" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.

name: Changing Times, Ran Mitake
text: 【CONT】 If "Tsugurific, Tsugumi Hazawa" is in your clock, this card gets -1 level while in your hand. 【CONT】 If this card is in your center stage, all of your 《Music》 characters get +1500 power. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [(2)] When "Rock and Glow" is placed on your climax area, if this card is in your center stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 2 《Afterglow》 characters, reveal them to your opponent, put them into your hand, choose up to 1 "Changing Times, Ran Mitake" in your hand, put it in any position of your stage, and shuffle your deck.

name: Passionate Performance, MASKING
text: 【AUTO】 During the turn that this card is placed on the stage from your hand, at the beginning of the encore step, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 Accelerate [Put 1 《Music》 character from your waiting room at the bottom of your clock] At the beginning of your climax phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 card in your waiting room, return all cards except that card in your waiting room to your deck, and shuffle your deck.

name: The Same as Always, Ran Mitake
text: 【AUTO】 [(1)] When this card attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, put the top three cards of your deck into your waiting room, and deal X damage to your opponent. X is equal to the number of cards with "Alarm" revealed among those cards. (This damage may be canceled) 【AUTO】 【CLOCK】 Alarm [(1) Put the top card of your deck at the bottom of your clock] If this card is the top card of your clock, at the beginning of your main phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to one 《Afterglow》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.

name: Continuing Performance, Moca Aoba
text: 【CONT】 You can put up to 4 cards with the same card name as this card and cards named ""Accepting Feelings" Moca Aoba" in your deck. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card attacks, if "That Is How I Roll!" is in your climax area, look at up to 2 cards from the top of your opponent's deck, choose up to 2 cards from among them, put them into their waiting room, put the rest on top of their deck in any order, look at up to 2 cards from your deck, choose up to 2 cards from among them, put them into your waiting room, and put the rest on top of your deck in any order. 【AUTO】 During the turn that this card is placed on the stage from your hand, at the beginning of the encore step, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room.

name: Congratulatory Bouquet, Kasumi Toyama
text: 【ACT】 [(1) Put 1 climax from your hand into your waiting room] Choose 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand. 【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1) 【REST】 this card] Flip over 4 cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed among those cards, draw up to 1 card.

name: Armful of Happiness, Rimi Ushigome
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose one of your other 《Music》 characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 [Return this card to your hand] When a climax is put on your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose one of your characters, and that character gets +2000 power until end of turn.

name: That Which Lies in Her Hands, Kasumi Toyama
text: 【AUTO】 [(1) Put the top card of your deck into your clock] When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a character in your waiting room with "Kasumi(香澄)" or "Tae(たえ)" or "Rimi(りみ)" or "Saya(沙綾)" or "Arisa(有咲)" in its card name, and return it to your hand.

name: Story of Unfolding Dreams, Kasumi Toyama
text: 【AUTO】 This ability activates up to 2 times per turn. When your other 《Music》 character or a character with "Asuka(明日香)" in its card name is placed on the stage, this card gets +1000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card attacks, if "Twinkle Twinkle Little Star" is in your climax area, you may choose 1 "Something in the Warehouse" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.

name: Appearance of an Actress, Chisato Shirasagi
text: 【AUTO】 [(1)] When you use this card's "Backup", if the number of colors of your characters on stage is four or more, you may pay the cost. If you do, return all cards in your waiting room to your deck, and shuffle your deck. 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 2500, Level 2 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose one of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +2500 power until end of turn)

name: Overflowing Enthusiasm, Saya Yamabuki
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +X power. X is equal to that character's level ×500. 【ACT】 [【REST】 this card and 1 of your other characters] If you have an event in your waiting room, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +500 power and the following ability until end of turn. "【CONT】 During this card's battle, your opponent cannot play events or "Backup" from their hand."

name: A Stage of Blessings, Rimi Ushigome
text: 【AUTO】 Change [(1) Put 2 《Music》 characters from your hand into your waiting room & Return this card to your hand] At the beginning of your climax phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 "Dreamlike Scenery, Rimi Ushigome" in your waiting room, and put it in the stage position that this card was in.

name: Summer Uniform, Saya Yamabuki
text: 【CONT】 This card gets +1000 power for each of your other 《Music》 characters. 【AUTO】 [(1)] At the beginning of the encore step, if you do not have another 【REST】 character in your center stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, 【REST】 this card.

name: Dreamlike Scenery, Rimi Ushigome
text: 【CONT】 If all of your characters are 《Music》, this card gets +2000 power. 【AUTO】 [Put a card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand or by a "Change" effect, you may pay the cost. If you do, put the top card of your clock into your stock. 【AUTO】 [(1)] At the beginning of your opponent's attack phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose one of your 《Music》 characters and this card, and exchange them as 【STAND】 .

name: Like the Sun, Saya Yamabuki
text: 【CONT】 If you have 4 or more 《Music》 characters, this card gets -1 level while in your hand. 【CONT】 If you have 2 or more other 《Music》 characters, this card gets +1000 power. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room.

name: My Way of Being an Idol, Chisato Shirasagi
text: 【CONT】 If this card is in your center stage, all of your 《Music》 characters get +1500 power. 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may pay the cost. If you do, deal 1 damage to your opponent. (Damage may be canceled)

name: Fluffy Bunny, Tae Hanazono
text: 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, if this card's battle opponent is level 0 or lower, you may put that character at the bottom of your opponent's deck. 【ACT】 [(1) Put this card into your waiting room] Look at up to 4 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 《Poppin'Party》 character from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.

name: Scenery of Everyday Life, Sayo Hikawa
text: 【AUTO】 [(1)] At the beginning of the encore step, if you do not have another 【REST】 character in your center stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, 【REST】 this card. 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, if this card's battle opponent is level 0 or lower, you may put that character at the bottom of your opponent's deck.

name: The Coolest Drummer in the World, Ako Udagawa
text: 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When your climax is placed on your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, draw 1 card. 【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1) 【REST】 2 of your characters] Flip over 5 cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax with in its trigger icon revealed among those cards, choose up to 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.

name: My Feelings Towards Music, Rui Yashio
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if you have 2 or more other 《Music》 characters, you may draw 1 card. If you do, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room. 【ACT】 [(1) Put this card into your waiting room] Choose up to 1 《Music》 character with level equal to or lower than your level in your hand, and put it on the stage position that this card was on.

name: The Real Me, Maya Yamato
text: 【CONT】 All of your other 《Pastel＊Palettes》 characters get +500 power. 【ACT】 [(1) Put this card into your waiting room] If your level is 1 or higher, choose 1 "Colorful Decorations, Eve Wakamiya" in your waiting room, and put it in the stage position that this card was in.

name: Passionate About Music, Yukina Minato
text: 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, reveal the top card of your deck, choose 1 level X or lower character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand. X is equal to the level of the revealed card. (Climax are regarded as level 0. Return the revealed card to its original place)

name: All the Time Spent Is Important, Rinko Shirokane
text: 【CONT】 If you have another "The Coolest Drummer in the World, Ako Udagawa", all of your other 《Roselia》 characters get +500 power. 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +500 power.

name: Not Used to the Dress, Rinko Shirokane
text: 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your clock] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, look at up to X cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 card from among them, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room. X is equal to the number of other 《Roselia》 characters you have. 【AUTO】 When damage dealt by this card is canceled, you may put this card into your stock.

name: Bloody la Vie en Rose, Mashiro Kurata
text: 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, look at up to 3 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 card from among them, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.

name: Loves Jerky, CHU²
text: 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, reveal the top card of your deck, choose 1 level X or lower character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand. X is equal to the level of the revealed card. (Climax are regarded as level 0. Return the revealed card to its original place)

name: Natural in Front of Camera, Aya Maruyama
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose 1 of your 《Pastel＊Palettes》 characters, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 《Pastel＊Palettes》 character from your waiting room to the bottom of your clock] When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 《Pastel＊Palettes》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.

name: Songstress of the Blue Rose, Yukina Minato
text: 【CONT】 You can put up to 4 cards with the same card name as this card and cards named ""Rausch und/and Craziness Ⅱ" Yukina Minato" in your deck. 【AUTO】 [(1) Put the top card of your deck into your clock] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 1 level 1 or lower character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck. 【AUTO】 During this card's battle, when the damage you received is canceled, you may return this card to your hand.

name: Daily Efforts, Lisa Imai
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if you have 2 or more other 《Roselia》 characters, you may draw 1 card. If you do, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 1 《Roselia》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.

name: As the Little Sister, Ako Udagawa
text: 【CONT】 If you have 2 or more other 《Roselia》 characters, this card gets +1000 power. 【AUTO】 [Put 1 climax from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 《Music》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.

name: Path to a Dream, Chisato Shirasagi
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, look at the top card of your deck, and put it on the top or at the bottom of your deck. 【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1) 【REST】 2 of your characters] Flip over X cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed among those cards, choose up to 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand. X is equal to the number of colors of your characters on stage +1.

name: Confident Hard Worker, Tsukushi Futaba
text: 【CONT】 You can put up to 4 cards with the same card name as this card and cards named ""Fufu, Leave It to Me!" Tsukushi Futaba" in your deck. 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, look at up to 4 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 level 1 or higher card from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room. (Climax are regarded as level 0)

name: Outcome of Prioritizing Emotion, Rui Yashio
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, put the top 2 cards of your deck into your waiting room. If there is a level 0 or lower character revealed among those cards, this card's soul does not decrease by side attacking until end of turn. 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 climax from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 climax in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.

name: Commitment to Cuteness, PAREO
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a 《Music》 character, this card gets +1 level and +1500 power until end of turn. (Return the revealed card to its original place) 【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, choose 1 of your other 《Music》 characters, 【REST】 it, and move it to an open position of your back stage.

name: An Honest Smile, Arisa Ichigaya
text: 【CONT】 You can put up to 4 cards with the same card name as this card and cards named "Happy Halloween♪ Arisa" in your deck. 【AUTO】 [Put 1 《Bonsai》 character from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose up to 1 "Waterside Rest Area" in your waiting room, return it to your hand, choose 1 of your other 《Music》 characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn.

name: The Path Chosen Again, Rui Yashio
text: 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if this card's battle opponent is cost 0 or lower, you may put that character at the bottom of your opponent's deck. 【AUTO】 Encore [Put 1 character from your hand into your waiting room] (When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】)

name: Embracing Ideals, Lisa Imai
text: 【CONT】 All 《Roselia》 characters in your hand get "【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 2500, Level 1 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room]". 【ACT】 [(1) 【REST】 this card] Look at up to 2 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 level 1 or higher card from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room. (Climax are regarded as level 0)

name: Research on Coolness, Ako Udagawa
text: 【CONT】 If you have 2 or more other 《Roselia》 characters, this card gets +3000 power. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is level 2 or higher, put it into your stock. (Otherwise, return it to its original place. Climax are regarded as level 0)

name: Good Example for Everyone, Tsukushi Futaba
text: 【CONT】 This card gets +500 power for each of your other 《Music》 characters. 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if the level of the character facing this card is 2, this card gets +6000 power until end of turn.

name: Love for Rabbits, Tae Hanazono
text: 【CONT】 You can put up to 4 cards with the same card name as this card and cards named ""Music of Bonds" Tae Hanazono" in your deck. 【CONT】 If you have 2 or more other 《Poppin'Party》 characters, this card gets +2000 power. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card attacks, if "Jumpin' Girls!" is in your climax area, and you have 2 or more other 《Poppin'Party》 characters, reveal the top 3 cards of your deck, your opponent chooses 1 event or character from among them, puts it into your hand, you choose up to 1 card from the remaining cards, put it on top of your deck, and put the rest into your waiting room.

name: Striving to Be Positive, Rinko Shirokane
text: 【AUTO】 [Put 1 climax with in its trigger icon from your hand into your waiting room] When this card attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, this card gets +1500 power and the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may draw 1 card." 【AUTO】 Experience When your other 《Roselia》 character attacks, if the total level of cards in your level is 2 or higher, this card gets +1500 power until end of turn.

name: Facing the Camera, Arisa Ichigaya
text: 【CONT】 If you have another "Congratulatory Bouquet, Kasumi Toyama", this card gets the following ability. "【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may put the top card of your deck into your stock."

name: My Daydreams, Mashiro Kurata
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, look at the top card of your deck, and put it on the top or at the bottom of your deck. 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if the level of this card's battle opponent is higher than your opponent's level, you may put that character at the bottom of your opponent's deck.

name: Rising Power Levels, PAREO
text: 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if the level of this card's battle opponent is higher than your opponent's level, you may put that character at the bottom of your opponent's deck. 【AUTO】 Accelerate [Put 1 《Music》 character from your waiting room to the bottom of your clock] At the beginning of your climax phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, look at the top card of your deck, put it on the top of your deck or into your waiting room, choose up to 1 《RAISE A SUILEN》 character in your waiting room, and put it into your stock.

name: Moves at Her Own Pace, Tae Hanazono
text: 【CONT】 If you have another "Congratulatory Bouquet, Kasumi Toyama" in your back stage, this card gets +2000 power. 【AUTO】 Encore [Put 1 character from your hand into your waiting room] (When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】)

name: Overflowing With Feelings, Eve Wakamiya
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, this card gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the total number of colors your characters in your stage have ×500. 【AUTO】 Encore [Put 1 character from your hand into your waiting room] (When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】)

name: To Hold One's Head High, Tsukushi Futaba
text: 【AUTO】 [Put 2 《Music》 characters from your hand into your waiting room] When you use this card's "Backup", you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 of your opponent's characters with level higher than your opponent's level, and put it at the bottom of their deck. 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 2500, Level 2 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +2500 power until end of turn)

name: Prepared to Fully Devote Oneself, Yukina Minato
text: 【AUTO】 When you use this card's "Backup", choose 1 of your characters in battle, and that character gets the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, put that character into your opponent's memory." 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 3000, Level 2 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +3000 power until end of turn)

name: To Stand Side by Side, Sayo Hikawa
text: 【AUTO】 [(2) Put 1 character from your stage into your waiting room] When you use this card's "Backup", you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 of your opponent's characters with level higher than your opponent's level, and put it into their waiting room. 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 2500, Level 2 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +2500 power until end of turn)

name: My Idol Path, Maya Yamato
text: 【CONT】 If the number of colors of your characters on stage is four or more, all of your other 《Music》 characters get +X power. X is equal to 500 multiplied by that character's level. 【CONT】 This card gets all the colors of the face up markers underneath this card. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may choose a card in your waiting room, and put it face up underneath this card as a marker.

name: Adorable Makeover, PAREO
text: 【CONT】 If you have another "The Greatest Music, CHU²" in your center stage, this card gets +5500 power, and "【AUTO】 Encore [Put 1 《Music》 character from your hand into your waiting room]". 【CONT】 All of your other "The Greatest Music, CHU²" get +2000 power, and the following abilities. "【CONT】 This card cannot be chosen by your opponent's effects." "【CONT】 This card cannot become 【REVERSE】 by 【AUTO】 effects of your opponent's characters." "【AUTO】 [(1)] When this card attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, during that attack, perform a trigger check 2 times on the trigger step."

name: Even if It Rains, Sayo Hikawa
text: 【CONT】 This card gets +1000 power for each of your other 《Music》 characters. 【AUTO】 Encore [Put a 《Music》 character from your hand into your waiting room] (When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】)

name: Even an Ordinary Girl Like Me, Mashiro Kurata
text: 【CONT】 You can put up to 4 cards with the same card name as this card and cards named ""Astral Harmony" Mashiro Kurata" in your deck. 【CONT】 This card gets +500 power for each of your other 《Music》 characters. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [(2) Put this card into your memory] When damage dealt by this card is canceled, if "Daylight" is in your climax area, and you have 4 or more other 《Music》 characters, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 character in your waiting room, and put it in the stage position that this card was in. (Battle does not take place)

name: The Greatest Music, CHU²
text: 【CONT】 If your waiting room has 2 or less climax, this card gets -1 level while in your hand. 【CONT】 This card gets +1000 power for each other 《Music》 character in your back stage. 【AUTO】 During the turn that this card is placed on the stage from your hand, at the beginning of the encore step, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room.

name: Totally Boppin'! Hina Hikawa
text: 【CONT】 If the number of colors of your characters on stage is four or more, this card gets +1500 power. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if the number of colors of your characters on stage is four or more, you may choose a 《Music》 character in your waiting room, and put it into your stock.

name: Always by Your Side, Lisa Imai
text: 【AUTO】 [(1)] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand or deck, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 1 "Always by Your Side, Lisa Imai", put it in any position of your stage, and shuffle your deck. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [(1) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card attacks, if "It's Getting Exciting" is in your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, look at up to 2 cards from the top of your deck, put them on the top of your deck in any order, and deal X damage to your opponent. X is equal to the number of "Always by Your Side, Lisa Imai" you have. (Damage may be canceled)

name: Waterside Rest Area
text: If you have 2 or less 《Music》 characters, this card cannot be played from your hand. Choose up to 1 《Music》 character in your waiting room, and put it into your stock. Choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 When this card attacks, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a 《Music》 character, put it into your hand." (Otherwise, return it to its original place) 【CONT】 You can put up to 4 cards with the same card name as this card and cards named "That Irritating Girl" in your deck.

name: Change the World With Sound
text: If you do not have a 《Music》 character, this card cannot be played from your hand. Choose 1 of the following effects, and perform it. "Search your deck for up to 1 《Music》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck." "Choose 1 of your characters, that character gets +3000 power until end of turn, and put this card into your stock." 【CONT】 You can put up to 4 cards with the same card name as this card and cards named "Change the world!" in your deck.

name: "To the Next Stage" Kasumi Toyama

If you do, look at up to 3 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 card from among them, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.

name: "To the Next Stage" Aya Maruyama

text: 【CONT】 During your turn, this card gets +2000 power. 【AUTO】 [(1)] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 climax in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.

name: "MyGO!!!!!" Soyo Nagasaki
text: 【AUTO】 [(2) Put 1 character from your stage into your waiting room] When you use this card's "Backup", you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 of your opponent's characters with level higher than your opponent's level, and put it into their waiting room. 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 2500, Level 2 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +2500 power until end of turn)

name: "MyGO!!!!!" Taki Shiina
text: 【CONT】 This card cannot side attack. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if you have 2 or more other 《Music》 characters, you may draw 1 card. If you do, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room.

name: "In the Sound of Moving Forward" Soyo Nagasaki
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +500 power. 【AUTO】 [Put 1 《Music》 character from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 1 ""Hesitating Without Hesitation" Rana Kaname", reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.

name: "In the Sound of Moving Forward" Anon Chihaya
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +1500 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your opponent's draw phase, put the top 2 cards of your deck into your waiting room. If there is a level 2 or higher card among those cards, you may return this card to your hand. (Climax are regarded as level 0)

name: "Live With Our Voice" Soyo Nagasaki
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose up to 2 of your 《Music》 characters, and those characters get +1500 power until end of turn.

name: "Hesitating Without Hesitation" Anon Chihaya
text: 【CONT】 If you have 2 or more other 《Music》 characters, this card gets +2000 power. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When "Embrace the Moment" is placed on your climax area, if this card is in your center stage, and you have 2 or more other 《Music》 characters, choose 1 of the following effects and perform it. "Choose 1 ""Hesitating Without Hesitation" Tomori Takamatsu" or ""In the Sound of Moving Forward" Tomori Takamatsu" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand." "Search your deck for up to 1 ""Hesitating Without Hesitation" Tomori Takamatsu" or ""In the Sound of Moving Forward" Tomori Takamatsu", reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck."

name: "Live With Our Voice" Anon Chihaya
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +X power. X is equal to that character's level ×500. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if you have 4 or more other 《Music》 characters, you may put the top card of your deck into your stock.

name: "Hesitating Without Hesitation" Soyo Nagasaki
text: 【AUTO】 [Put 1 other 《Music》 character from your stage into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, put the top card of your clock into your stock. 【AUTO】 [(3) Put 2 cards from your hand into your waiting room] When this card attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, deal 4 damage to your opponent. (Damage may be canceled)

name: Embrace the Moment
text:
【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul.
(: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand) (【COMEBACK】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)

name: "Hesitating Without Hesitation" Taki Shiina
text: 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your climax phase, choose 1 of your other 《MyGO!!!!!》 characters, and that character gets the following ability until end of turn. "【CONT】 During this card's battle, your opponent cannot play "Backup" from their hand." 【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1) 【REST】 this card] Flip over 5 cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed among those cards, draw up to 1 card.

name: "Live With Our Voice" Tomori Takamatsu
text: 【CONT】 All of your other ""Live With Our Voice" Taki Shiina" get +1500 power and "【AUTO】 Encore [Put 1 character from your hand into your waiting room]". 【AUTO】 Bond/""Live With Our Voice" Taki Shiina" [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] (When this card is played and placed on the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 ""Live With Our Voice" Taki Shiina" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)

name: "Hesitating Without Hesitation" Rana Kaname
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, this card gets +1000 power. 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 《Music》 character from your waiting room at the bottom of your clock] When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 《Music》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.

name: "In the Sound of Moving Forward" Rana Kaname
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if you have another 《Music》 character, this card gets +2000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 [(1) 【REST】 1 of your other 【STAND】 《Music》 characters] During the turn that this card is placed on the stage from your hand, when this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 1 《Music》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.

name: "In the Sound of Moving Forward" Taki Shiina
text: 【AUTO】 When you use this card's "Backup", choose 1 of your characters in battle, and that character gets the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, put that character into your memory." 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 3000, Level 2 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +3000 power until end of turn)

name: "In the Sound of Moving Forward" Tomori Takamatsu
text: 【CONT】 If your level is 2 or higher, this card gets the following ability. "【ACT】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room & Put this card into your waiting room] Choose up to 1 ""Hesitating Without Hesitation" Tomori Takamatsu" from your hand, and put it in the stage position that this card was in." 【CONT】 During your turn, this card gets +1500 power for each of your other 《Music》 characters.

name: "Live With Our Voice" Rana Kaname
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if the character facing this card is level 3 or higher, this card gets +6000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, if there is a climax in your climax area, search your deck for up to 1 《Music》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.

name: "Hesitating Without Hesitation" Tomori Takamatsu
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card attacks, if "We Are Shouting Here" is in your climax area, and you have another 《Music》 character, choose 1 of the following effects and perform it. "Choose up to 1 character in your waiting room, return it to your hand, choose up to 1 《Music》 character in your waiting room, and put it into your stock." "Deal 1 damage to your opponent." (Damage may be canceled)

name: Silhouette Dance
text: 【COUNTER】 If you do not have a 《Music》 character, this card cannot be played from your hand. Look at up to 4 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 《Music》 character from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.

name: We Are Shouting Here
text:
-【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul.
(: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 climax in your waiting room, and return it to your hand) (【GATE】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 climax in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)

name: Latent Expression
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +2 soul.
